SongName: 7 Little Girls Sitting in The Backseat
Lyric:
[by:无为世界]
[00:01.37](Dee doody doom doom, dee doody doom doom)
[00:04.91](Dee doody doom doom, DOOM)
[00:08.71]Seven little girls sittin' in the back seat
[00:12.44]Huggin and a'kissin with Fred
[00:15.81]I said "why don't one of you come up and sit beside me?"
[00:19.92]And this is what the seven girls said
[01:03.92][00:22.99](All together now, one, two, three)
[01:06.87][00:25.57](Keep you mind on your drivin')
[01:08.57][00:27.70](Keep you hands on the wheel)
[01:10.55][00:29.58](Keep your snoopy eyes on the road ahead)
[01:14.86][00:33.80](We're havin' fun sittin' in the back seat kissin' and a'huggin with Fred)（
[01:22.93][00:41.65](Dee doody doom doom, dee doody doom doom)
[01:26.76][00:45.71](Dee doody doom doom, DOOM)
[00:49.58]Drove through the town, drove through the country
[00:53.28]Showed 'em how a motor could go
[00:56.60]I said "how do you like my triple carburetor?"
[01:00.76]And one of them whispered low
[01:30.53]Seven little girls smoochin' in the back seat
[01:34.33]Every one in love with Fred
[01:37.70]I said "you don't need me, I'll get off at my house"
[01:41.96]And this is what the seven girls said
[01:44.68](All together now, one, two, three)
[01:47.35](Keep you mind on your drivin')
[01:49.51](Keep you hands on the wheel)
[01:51.70](Keep your snoopy eyes on the road ahead)
[01:55.56](We're havin' fun sittin' in the back seat kissin' and a'huggin with Fred)
[02:03.56]All of them in love with Fred
[02:05.97](Dee doody doom doom)
[02:07.38]Kissin' and a'huggin with Fred
[02:09.52](Dee doody doom doom)
[02:11.04]Wish that I could be like Fred
[02:13.65]undefined
